Custom Websites

Tailored web solutions to meet your specific needs

At My Web Dev Company, I create custom websites that perfectly reflect your company's identity while offering an exceptional user experience. Each project is carefully developed using the most suitable technologies for your needs and following web best practices.

Whether you're a small business, a freelancer, or a large organization, I offer personalized web solutions that will help you achieve your business goals and stand out from the competition.

Discuss your project

Types of websites I create

Showcase Website

A showcase website is the ideal solution for presenting your company, services, or products online. It's a professional digital business card that highlights your activity and allows you to establish a credible online presence.

These sites are designed to be elegant, informative, and easy to navigate, providing your visitors with all the information they need to contact you or learn more about your business.

Need a showcase website? Contact me

E-commerce Website

An e-commerce website allows you to sell your products or services directly online. I develop complete, intuitive, and secure online stores that offer a smooth shopping experience for your customers.

These sites include all essential features: product catalog, shopping cart, secure payment, inventory management, and much more. They are also optimized for mobile devices, allowing your customers to shop wherever they are.

Need an e-commerce website? Contact me

Custom Website

A custom website is developed specifically to meet your unique needs. If you need specific features or a personalized web solution that doesn't fit standard models, this is the ideal option for you.

I work closely with you to understand your requirements and create a tailor-made web solution that perfectly meets your objectives. These sites can include custom content management systems, integrations with other systems, advanced features, and much more.

Need a custom website? Contact me

Web Eco-design

All my sites are developed according to eco-design principles, aiming to reduce their environmental impact while improving their performance:

  • Optimized code to reduce energy consumption
  • Compressed images and modern formats to reduce page weight
  • Green hosting powered by renewable energy
  • Fast loading times for a better user experience
  • Sustainable design for increased site longevity

An eco-designed site is not only better for the environment, but it also offers a better user experience and can help reduce your hosting costs.

SEO Optimization

All my sites are optimized for search engines from their conception:

  • Technical structure optimized for search engines
  • Optimal loading speed, a key factor for Google
  • Semantic markup for better understanding by search engines
  • Responsive design for an optimal experience on all devices
  • Optimized metadata and tags for each page
  • Advice on content strategy to improve your visibility

A well-optimized site helps you attract more qualified visitors and convert more customers.

Frequently Asked Questions

How much does it cost to create a website?

The cost of a website varies depending on its complexity, required features, and desired design. A simple showcase site can start from $1,800, while an e-commerce site or custom web application represents a larger investment. I always provide you with a detailed quote after discussing your specific needs.

How long does it take to develop a website?

Development time depends on the project's complexity. Generally, a showcase site can be completed in 4 to 6 weeks, an e-commerce site in 8 to 12 weeks, and a complex custom site can take 3 months or more. I always provide you with a realistic timeline at the beginning of the project.

What types of sites can you create?

I develop all types of websites: showcase sites, e-commerce sites, blogs, portfolios, web applications, intranets, extranets, and custom solutions. Whatever your activity or sector, I can create a web solution adapted to your specific needs.

Do you offer maintenance services once the site is online?

Yes, I offer several maintenance packages to ensure your site functions properly over time: security updates, regular backups, bug fixes, minor modifications, and improvements. These services allow you to focus on your business while I take care of your site's technical health.

Will the site be optimized for search engine optimization (SEO)?

Absolutely! All my sites are developed with special attention to SEO. This includes an optimized technical structure, clean and semantic code, fast loading times, and perfect mobile compatibility. I also provide you with advice to optimize your content and improve your visibility in search engines.

Will the site be mobile and tablet friendly?

Yes, all my sites are developed using a "mobile-first" approach and use responsive design techniques. This ensures an optimal user experience on all devices: smartphones, tablets, laptops, and desktop computers, regardless of screen size.

Will I be able to update the content myself?

Yes, I systematically integrate a user-friendly content management system (CMS) that allows you to easily update your site's content without technical knowledge. I also provide training and documentation to help you manage your site independently.

What are the advantages of a custom site over a standard model?

A custom site offers many advantages: it is perfectly adapted to your specific needs, it allows you to stand out from the competition with a unique design, it can easily evolve with your business, and it generally offers better performance and a better user experience than a site based on a generic template.

Do you have any examples of sites you have created?

Yes, you can view my portfolio to see examples of websites I've developed for various clients and industries. Each project is accompanied by a detailed description outlining the objectives, challenges, and implemented solutions.

How is the site's performance measured once it's online?

I integrate analytics tools like Google Analytics to track your site's performance. We can measure traffic, user behavior, conversion rates, and other important metrics. I also offer regular reports and recommendations to continuously improve your site's performance.

What do I do if I need new features later on?

All my sites are designed to be scalable. You can contact me at any time to add new features or evolve your site according to your needs. I will provide you with a quote for these additional developments and ensure they integrate perfectly with your existing site.

Ready to launch your web project?

Contact me today to discuss your needs and get a personalized quote for your website.
